Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Reroute at Armitage/Racine
ShortDescription: 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, Webster, & Sheffield, due to street blockage near Armitage/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, Webster, & Sheffield, due to street blockage near Armitage/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Kedzie-Homan
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Kedzie-Homan due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Kedzie-Homan due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
